titles.title: Freedom From Foreign Influence Act
To allow for energy exploration in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 11/17/2014--Introduced. Freedom From Foreign Influence Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to issue promptly permits allowing energy resources exploration and extraction in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.
